metadata.name: Matt Oworu - Canada 7’s International Rugby Player
metadata.description:
Stats-Backed NFT
NFT: Matt Oworu - Canada 7’s International Rugby Player

Athlete Background: Matthew Owuru is a promising young rugby talent, born in Calgary, Canada, in 2000.  Growing up in Canada, Basketball was his first love, followed by football. Sports have always been part of his life. 
His athletic really kicked when his family moved to Zimbabwe, where he started to pick up the game of rugby.
On the  2nd of July 2022, Matt was his given his first Rugby 7s Cap for the Canada National Team - its only up from here!

About this NFT: This NFT provides Matt’s performance summary for the 2022 Canada 7s season.

Watch the Marketplace for the release of his 2023 stats, including his performance from the HSBC 7s circuit.
